adding-headings_key2: Calling add_heading() adds a paragraph with one of the heading styles. Enter the following into the interactive shell:
adding-headings_key3: The arguments to addheading() are a string of the heading text and an integer from 0 to 4. The integer 0 makes the heading the Title style, which is used for the top of the document. Integers 1 to 4 are for various heading levels, with 1 being the main heading and 4 the lowest subheading. The addheading() function returns a Paragraph object to save you the step of extracting it from the Document object as a separate step.
adding-headings_key4: The resulting headings.docx file will look like Figure 13-10.
adding-headings_key5: Figure 13-10. The headings.docx document with headings 0 to 4
